thread.title: Facebook tests buttons to express anger, sadness
thread.title_full: Facebook tests buttons to express anger, sadness - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Facebook tests buttons to express anger, sadness
text:
Photo: Facebook Facebook is testing an extension of its traditional "like" button, allowing users in Ireland and Spain to select other types of emoji to express their emotions including love and anger. Facebook is testing an extension of its traditional "like" button,...
Facebook said Thursday it is testing a way for people to express different emotions on its social network other than its traditional “thumbs up” button. Facebook is testing an extension of its traditional "like" button, allowing users in Ireland and Spain to select other types of emoji to express their emotions including love and anger. Facebook is testing an extension of its traditional "like" button,...
Facebook said Thursday it is testing a way for people to express different emotions on its social network other than its traditional “thumbs up” button.
